Row.Text: Welcome to the Joseon Court, friend. I have done much to help my people - can you say the same?
Greetings - I am Sejong of Korea. Have you come seeking wisdom and enlightenment, enjoyed by many in my presence?
Welcome to the fair court of Korea, honored stranger. I am Sejong, enlightened leader of these, my mighty people.
This distasteful behavior is what I expect from Yangpyeong, not you.
It seems more goes on behind that vapid stare than I thought.
What a profound waste of time.
Superior technology, planning, and wisdom triumphs yet again.
You cannot best the Hall of Worthies – my country’s best minds act in concert against you.
A minor miscalculation. It will not happen again.
How have you done this? What manner of tactics do you employ?
Where to shall my people look for guidance now? A time of darkness is yet upon us.
My unwavering search for science has blinded me to the true threat to my nation, until it was much too late. Leave me to my darkness.
No, I had so much yet to do…so much yet to discover. You have robbed the world of brilliance in your quest of greed.
A pleasant day to you.
Greetings.
Until we meet again.
Goodbye.
Very well.
While you do much to peak my interest, you’ll need to first yet perfect your asking.
Can you do a little better?
That's not quite good enough.
Almost...
I am not interested.
Greed does not become you, leading often to sadness. I hope this is for a more noble cause.
You presume too much above your station.
What better way to work towards friendship than by the sharing of material wealth?
A gift bearing the weight of your station is required to enjoy the benefits of this court.
All right.
Very Well.
I must refuse.
No.
Go on.
Go ahead.
Greetings, friend.
Welcome.
Farewell.
Goodbye.
Happily agreed
I would love to accept your offer as it stands, but I know the Hall wouldn’t approve of my logic.
Is that the best you can do?
You're almost there...
Thank you, but no.
You had but to ask! A wise man shares his bounty amongst his friends, so that all may prosper.
Words alone cannot express my sorrow for having to disappoint you.
My friend, we have much to discuss and much to gain from each other.
The Worthies kindly request the aid of your generosity in this, our time of need.
Certainly.
Certainly not.
We decline.
Proceed.
I'm listening.
Well?
What do you want?
That is all.
Go away now.
Agreed.
Trained though you may be in the arts of negotiation, this insulting offer cannot stand as it is. Improve it immediately.
That's not good enough.
You must do better than that.
Almost...
Even an uneducated street urchin would know he was being cheated by this debasing offer. Be gone!
While this brings much shame upon me, I do what I must for my nation.
What kind of delusions do you suffer under, to think that such a ploy would work?
Although the sight of your face fills me with disgust, I shall momentarily persevere for the good of my people.
You will pay for your multiple crimes and indiscretions, starting now with this.
Oh, very well.
Of course not.
That's unacceptable.
You cannot be serious!
And?
The Hall grows weary of your tiresome antics. We shall forcefully liberate your downtrodden, and lead them to enlightenment.
Time waits for no man, and I feel its changeless march growing ever more urgent. You stand in our way, and I have not the resources left for more diplomatic means.
I’ve experiments to run, research to be done, and here you stand like an aging wall to block my path. I shall remove you.
What cursed treachery is this? Have you no honor, no shame?
You sad little person. Soon you shall feel the full weight of our mighty science bearing down upon you.
Excellent, excellent! I have been looking for a reason to try out my newly outfitted army, and you have provided me with just the occasion.
